content: Is there any way to stop Zulip from automatically converting text to urls? I don't really need crates.io made into a link every single time. I wouldn't mind so much but I find the blue text draws unnecessary attention to something that's not really being used as a link within its context. I'd feel the same way if random words were italicized or bolded.
but I suspect you want something client-side, not something that the message author has to do themselves
Especially annoying when people type build.rs without backticks and it becomes a URL: build.rs :laughing:
